ygData.subject: Re: How do I make sewing kits...
ygData.msgSnippet: There is an idea I hadn t thought about.  What is the difference, if any, between a sewing kit purchased from a merchant and a sewing kit made by us? What
ygData.messageBody:
There is an idea I hadn't thought about. What is the difference, if any,
between a sewing kit purchased from a merchant and a sewing kit made by us?
What would be really nice is if the sewing kit made by us improved the
chance of a tailor suceeding. Right now after patchwork it is almost
impossable to make the other types of leather based armor. It would be
great if we could make a kit that would help them out. Of course this is
just and idea. I have no idea what the difference really is.

Mark
